text: deva granthaya denu læbuvan gen, "numbala ehi adahas janayata pæhædili karanu, tavada numbala eya vasan nokaranu" yæyi allah pratigna gat avasthava sihipat karanu. namut ovuhu eya ovun ge pita pedesin pitupasata visi kaloya. e (pratignava) venuvata alpa milak laba gattoya. ovun milata ganna dæ ita napuru viya
